summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Mail Manager application. All backend APIs functional (100% success rate). Frontend testing successful with all major features working including authentication, CRUD operations, workflow management, and role-based access control.
passed_tests: Backend API Authentication (admin/user login, token validation)
Backend Services CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Backend Correspondents management with search functionality
Backend Mails workflow (create, auto-assignment, status updates)
Backend Users management (admin-only access control)
Backend Dashboard statistics endpoint
Frontend Login page with mocked Azure AD authentication
Frontend Dashboard with statistics display and quick actions
Frontend Services page with admin-only create/edit/delete controls
Frontend Correspondents page with search and CRUD operations
Frontend Mails page with filtering, search, and creation workflow
Frontend Mail detail page with auto-assignment and status workflow
Frontend Users page with admin-only access restrictions
Frontend Role-based access control (admin vs regular user permissions)
Frontend Logout functionality
Integration between frontend and backend APIs
Correspondent autocomplete functionality in mail creation
Service and sub-service selection in mail creation
Workflow status changes with comments
Auto-assignment of mails to first opener
